     why would it not be

     try to paint them all if possible

     the one that fits your screen

5.24.17  1:00 am   I really enjoy your unique style of videos. Do you plan on making more longer videos like history of japan?

     how about something of a more medium size

5.24.17  12:52 am   if life had an undo button and i kept pressing it would i eventually not exist or would it limit the number of times i could press it

     you made up this situation, so you get to specify the rules

5.24.17  12:47 am   how do you explain things so well?

     i'm just trying to be reasonable
5.24.17  12:46 am   this is not a question, i am a rebel

5.24.17  12:09 am   What's the only place in this world who's fahrenheit and celsius degrees can be equal?

     i dunno, somewhere cold, like -40

5.23.17  11:28 pm   is the beanie an underrated fashion accessory?

      i don't know what its current rating is

5.23.17  11:25 pm   what was your thought process behind the video "get outta here"?

     better pick a short one this week cause this new schedule is crazy. and wow just figured out a cool color trick, and maybe it's ok to have captions in the video, breaking the rule i just made of only using captions on fridays
5.23.17  11:19 pm   greetings bill will you ever do a livestream?

5.23.17  10:52 pm   what do you do to cope with creators/musicians block?
5.23.17  10:43 pm   this is not a question lmao you got prangkt
5.23.17  10:25 pm   What do you usually do in your day?

5.23.17  9:59 pm   Do you have a patreon or something? I love your videos and I would be happy to support your work. I want to reward your efforts, even if me, a single viewer, just gave a single dollar.

5.23.17  9:58 pm   why don't you capitalize your "i"'s?

     i can think of 3 reasons. 1. i don't have to. 2. capital i already looks like another letter. and 3. a lower case i is much more personal and has more personality because it has an eye

5.23.17  9:56 pm   is hot food dangerous?

     it depends how hot it is

5.23.17  9:51 pm   what's the lowest note you can sing?

   i generally don't write below A110hz. i could do lower on some days but it's not reliable

5.23.17  9:46 pm   how many keys are on your piano?

     61

5.23.17  9:44 pm   how many is too many, and in the same sense, how many is not enough?

     it depends how many you want

5.23.17  9:40 pm   Are there any conventions within Western popular music that you think are relied on too heavily, to the point of restricting artistic freedom due to the expectation to adhere to them?

     well, you don't have to really adhere to anything. so no one is actually restricted

5.23.17  9:35 pm   can you asdfghjkl?

     sure
5.23.17  9:27 pm   History or science?

5.23.17  9:14 pm   i had a dream that i woke up and you had uploaded like, 10+ new songs to youtube at once. it was really unrealistic because i know you'd never hold off on uploading them like that, but it sure was exciting

     it is more realistic than you might expect
5.23.17  8:26 pm   can you make the umbrella thing your website icon so it stands out

5.23.17  8:23 pm   do you like doing short videos or long videos?

     how about something of a more medium size

5.23.17  8:21 pm   Let's say you were writing something in B-flat major. And at the beginning of one measure, you have a natural on an E-flat in the left hand. Would you also write a natural on an E if there were one in the right hand in the same measure? Or do you assume that the natural applies to every E in that measure, not just the E that is one the same line/space as the first E?

     ah, that is a good question. i'm sure everyone will chime in saying it's one way or the other, but from what i've seen, there is no clear answer. that's why it's good to use 'courtesy accidentals' which is when you put the accidental (that's the sharp/flat/natural symbol) in parentheses

5.23.17  8:00 pm   is pluto a planet

     you have to decide for yourself

5.23.17  7:51 pm   True or False? Y/N

     maybe somewhere in between

5.23.17  7:44 pm   can you not reply to this sarcastically

     sure

5.23.17  7:43 pm   do you believe in wizards? does anyone you know believe in them?

     everyone is wizards

5.23.17  7:43 pm   what has come to existence on this mysterious planet called earth first? the feathery animal also known as a chicken, or the semi-hard case shelling that hold's a chicken fetus that is still developing with its survival needs called an egg?

5.23.17  7:22 pm   What's your favorite medium sized thing?

     our home planet, Earth

5.23.17  7:20 pm   do make your songs by catching them in a butterfly net and putting them into a computer?

     i catch the instructions in a net. then i have to build them, according to the instructions. and also catch more instructions for new songs that are flying in also

5.23.17  7:18 pm   Do you think humans have enough information about the universe to accurately predict the heat death of the universe?

     you can try to predict the future, but then it's allowed to change after you predicted it, so

5.23.17  7:18 pm   can your answer to this question be longer than 1 word?

     i'll see what i can do

5.23.17  7:16 pm   how does one get over their ex?

     re-discover yourself

     oh hell yeah

     maybe

     i've never been tested

     oh hell yeah

5.23.17  5:59 pm   what surprises you daily?

     that the dream i just had was a dream

     the same place where numbers came from

5.23.17  5:02 pm   do you ever feel like you're stuck using the same songwriting patterns over and over and don't know how to break out?

     no
5.23.17  4:45 pm   Do you answer every question that is asked here?

5.23.17  4:12 pm   any advice on how to get a sharper piano recording on an iphone? the audio keeps sounding fuzzy and it's hard to distinguish the ingredients of the chords. thx

     try putting the phone in different places. i don't know where you have been putting it but definitely don't put it on the piano if it's an acoustic piano. put it somewhere else in the room
